title: Ascension Bug? Client crashing?
body: So twice today, when I've been playing Ascension, the game randomly freezes (all champs sit put and nothing is happening) but I am still able to move the camera, look at items, etc. BOTH times I've had to quit the game and attempt to reconnect, BOTH times I have been unable to reconnect (gives the error of Unable to Connect to Server, Check Your Network Connection and Reconnect to the Game), and BOTH times have been when I'm using Warwick. Any clue what's going on, Rito?

replies.body:
When we rolled out Ascension for this weekend, we noticed that some games were crashing. We quickly realized this may have been a bug caused by certain abilities. Shaco has been disabled for the time being, so let me know if this is still an issue for you.

Here's a link to the server status page so you can see any updates on this issue: [Server Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na)

Just came out from an ascension game like that, though I was playing ahri

Had the same problems as you, I disconnected and couldn't reconnect :/
